table.name: civicrm_action_log
table.comment: Table to store log for the reminder.

field.name: entity_id
field.comment: FK to id of the entity that the action was performed on. Pseudo - FK.

field.name: entity_table
field.comment: name of the entity table for the above id, e.g. civicrm_activity, civicrm_participant

field.name: action_schedule_id
field.comment: FK to the action schedule that this action originated from.

field.name: action_date_time
field.comment: date time that the action was performed on.

field.name: is_error
field.comment: Was there any error sending the reminder?

field.name: message
field.comment: Description / text in case there was an error encountered.

field.name: repetition_number
field.comment: Keeps track of the sequence number of this repetition.
